text: Love In This Club Part II is a song by American singer Usher from his album Here I Stand. The song features Lil Wayne and Beyoncé and it is a remix of the original song, but the structure and lyrics of the song are completely different from the original: "Love in This Club", so the song's name was changed to "Love in This Club Part II". == Chart Performance == Chart (2008) Peak position U.S. Billboard Hot 100 79 U.S. Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs 14 U.S. Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Airplay 14 Category:2008 songs Category:Beyoncé songs Category:Lil Wayne songs Category:Usher songs
title: Love in This Club Part II
